title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node, Bun, and modern browsers.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use any Ollama model as an LLM or chat backend with chains, agents, and retrieval.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, files, RAG, multi-user, dark mode) packaged in one Docker command.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive CLI wrapper around Ollama with chat history, markdown rendering, and prompt templates.

title: oll4ma
summary: Lightweight Rust crate to embed and call Ollama models natively without REST overhead.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: GitHub Copilot-like VS Code extension powered by Ollama; local, private code completions.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama generators and embedders in production pipelines.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG example combining Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector store for private document QA.

title: ollama-n8n-node
summary: Native n8n node to call Ollama models inside no-code automation workflows.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-host Discord bot that brings local LLM chat to any server using Ollama backends.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-dagger-module
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama as a CI service for testing LLM-powered features in pipelines.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit component that wraps Ollama chat for rapid internal LLM prototypes.

title: ollama-laravel
summary: Laravel package providing a fluent facade and queue jobs for generating text with Ollama.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Unofficial but mature Rust crate on crates.io exposing typed async bindings to Ollama’s REST API.

title: ollama-go
summary: Community-maintained Go SDK mirroring the official Python/JS APIs for easy adoption.

title: ollama-dotnet
summary: .NET SDK and Aspire component for integrating Ollama into C# applications and cloud-native services.

title: ollama-models
summary: Curated registry of Modelfile recipes for community-tuned Llama, Mistral, CodeLlama, and vision variants.
